# Large packages that require isolated builds (one at a time)
# These packages require significant disk space during compilation

# Compilers and runtimes (10-20 GB each)
rust
llvm-mingw-w64
llvm-mingw-w64-tools
dotnet-host
dotnet8.0
dotnet9.0
ghc
kotlin
swift
openjdk-17
openjdk-21
mono

# Heavy Rust packages (5-10 GB)
agg
rust-analyzer
rust-bindgen

# Large Node.js
nodejs-lts

# Chromium-based
chromium

# Other large packages
gcc-default
clang
swiftshader
